channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’m terrified I’ll be homeless when my husband, 76, stops working’: We only have $100K. What happens to people like us?
item.description: “I’m sick of reading how many millions everyone has.”

item.title: It’s time to take profits in silver after record-breaking run, these analysts say
item.description: Histrorically, after years of 100% returns or better, the following twelve months are generally poor for silver.

item.title: Actress Lori Loughlin sells Palm Desert home for $16.5 million after split with husband

item.title: BP CEO quits after less than two years. A former Exxon exec who ran Australia’s largest oil company will take over.
item.description: BP on Thursday made an abrupt shift in leadership, as CEO Murray Auchinloss is stepping down immediately after less than two years on the job.

item.title: From on-device AI to the ‘girlfriend index,’ trading ideas from the research firm that nailed 2025’s investment themes
item.description: Citrini Research nailed many investment themes for 2025. Here are a handful of ideas they see delivering potential in 2026.

item.title: Buy the dip on Core Scientific as 2026 approaches, says Citizens
item.description: Citizens raised its price target and stock rating for Core Scientific, arguing the firm is "undervalued."

item.title: Thursday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: A selloff in Oracle and other tech names dragged the S&P 500 to a fourth straight losing session on Wednesday.

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial
item.description: DBVT stock surges as much as 46% on positive Phase 3 results for Viaskin Peanut patch, a potential breakthrough treatment for peanut allergies in youn...

item.title: Airbnb’s shares are in a 5-year slump. One analyst believes 2026 will be their year
item.description: After spending more than four years on the sidelines, RBC Capital Markets finally upgraded shares of Airbnb to an outperform rating.

item.title: This communication services ETF could be on the verge of a breakout, charts show
item.description: A bullish chart pattern has been forming for the State Street Communication Services Select Sector SPDR ETF (XLC).

item.title: ServiceNow shares were rocked this week. Now Bernstein says it’s the cheapest stock in software
item.description: Bernstein's $1,093 price target is approximately 40% above where shares of ServiceNow closed on Tuesday.

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
